note: Fame (명성) is merely social reputation. Internal Energy (내공) is the true indicator of strength.

삼류.name: 삼류
삼류.enlightenment: Memorizing sequences. Understanding form over principle.
삼류.physical_changes: Danjeon not formed or faint. Slightly stronger bones than commoners.

이류.name: 이류
이류.capability: Can use forms in combat. Concentrates Qi for impact.
이류.enlightenment: Understanding flow and linkage of techniques.
이류.physical_changes: Lower Danjeon (하단전) formed. Some of 12 Meridians opened.
이류.qi_quality: Gas/Mist (기체). Hazy fog. Cannot project externally.

일류.name: 일류
일류.enlightenment: Harmony of Art and Heart. Knowing when to change forms (Byeon-cho).
일류.physical_changes: 12 Standard Meridians (십이정경) fully opened. Unimpeded flow.
일류.qi_quality: Compressed Gas (압축 기체). Thicker aura, destructive when infused.

절정.name: 절정
절정.capability: Projecting Qi (Sword Qi / Geom-gi). 'Sword and Self are One' (basic).
절정.physical_changes: 8 Extraordinary Meridians (기경팔맥) opening. Massive capacity increase.
절정.qi_quality: Liquid (액체). Flows like water. Forms visible Sword Qi.

초절정.name: 초절정
초절정.enlightenment: Unity of Mind, Qi, and Body (심기체 일치). Immediate reaction.
초절정.physical_changes: Ren & Du Meridians (임독양맥) Opened. Small Circulation (소주천) complete. Rapid recovery.
초절정.qi_quality: Mercury/High-Density Liquid (점성 액체). Heavy and solid. Can break Sword Qi.

화경.name: 화경
화경.enlightenment: Mind moves the Sword. Will over Form.
화경.physical_changes: Metamorphosis (환골탈태). Impurities expelled. Body reconstructed. Heaven & Earth Bridge (천지교타).

현경.name: 현경
현경.capability: Mind Sword (Sim-geom). Cutting space/intent. Harmony with Nature (Ja-yeon-che).
현경.enlightenment: I am Nature, Nature is Me (물아일체). Insight into Life/Death.
현경.physical_changes: Rejuvenation (반로환동). Aging stops. Return to prime/childhood.
현경.qi_quality: Void & Reality (허와 실). Presence erasure. Spatial pressure.

생사경.name: 생사경
생사경.enlightenment: Transcendence of Life and Death. Liberation from the mortal coil.
